rooms.description: Entrance hall with reception area, integrating Vastu for a welcoming energy.
Spacious living room overlooking the central courtyard and garden, designed in Chettinad style with traditional elements. Vastu recommendations: seating area towards the east.
Dining area adjacent to the living room for family meals; includes provisions for a pantry and kitchenette.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with Chettinad accents. Vastu: located away from direct sunlight in the south-west to maintain balance.
Master bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet on the ground floor for accessibility; oriented according to Vastu guidelines.
First additional bedroom designed in Chettinad style with ample natural lighting. Suitable for family members.
Second additional bedroom designed to accommodate guests or children, with a small adjoining balcony to the courtyard.
Servants' quarters with living and dining space, kitchenette, and private restroom; integrated within the ground floor layout while ensuring privacy and functionality.
